keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May seeks support to strengthen hand in Brexit negotiations and to ensure the best possible deal for Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Facing challenges from the Liberal Democrats and the SNP, with historical divisions of the referendum, seeking unified support to negotiate the best deal for Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: Prime Minister Theresa May asks country for support to strengthen hand in Brexit negotiations and to lock in Britain's economic progress.

leaflet.personalStatement: Prime Minister Theresa May sets out clear choice facing people in the June 8th General Election.

politicalExperience.achievements: Asks the country for support to strengthen her hand in Brexit negotiations and to lock in Britain's economic progress.

images.caption: Prime Minister Theresa May asks country for support to strengthen hand in Brexit negotiations and to lock in Britain's economic progress.

leaflet.additionalNotes: INSIDE: PM SETS OUT PLAN FOR A STRONGER BRITAIN
